name: Serious Mass Gainer - 5kg
description: Premium mass gainer formula with 1250 calories per serving to help build muscle mass and strength. Ideal for hard-gainers or those looking to add size.
details: Serious Mass provides you with the tools you need to pack on the pounds and help you develop the physique you've always wanted. Serious Mass is a substantial weight-gain supplement that can be used to feed your muscles nutrients needed to recover after intense physical activity, and to add the caloric support to promote weight gain.

name: Ultra Mass Gainer 2500
description: Advanced mass gainer with 2500 calories per serving and a 50g protein blend to maximize muscle growth and recovery.
details: Ultra Mass Gainer 2500 is the ultimate high-calorie formula designed for individuals struggling to put on muscle mass. With 2500 calories per serving and a 50g protein blend, it fuels muscle growth and supports post-workout recovery for even the hardest gainers.

name: HyperMass 5000 - Ultimate Weight Gainer
description: Maximum strength weight gainer with 5000 calories and 75g protein per serving. For serious mass building and quick weight gain.

name: Max Gainer Pro Complex - Vanilla
description: Professional-grade mass gainer with optimal protein to carb ratio. Enhanced with digestive enzymes for better absorption.

name: Massive Weight Gainer - 2.5kg
description: High-calorie weight gainer with added creatine and BCAAs for enhanced muscle building and recovery.

name: Elite Mass Gainer - Double Chocolate
description: Premium mass gainer with time-release protein blend for sustained amino acid delivery. Ideal for post-workout recovery.

name: Gold Standard Whey Protein
description: The world's best-selling whey protein powder, providing 24g of protein per serving with minimal fat and carbs.

name: Ultra Pure Protein Isolate - Vanilla
description: Ultra-filtered whey protein isolate with 27g of protein per serving and less than 1g of carbs and fat. Ideal for lean muscle building.

name: Essential BCAA 2:1:1 - Berry Blast
description: Essential branched-chain amino acids in the research-proven 2:1:1 ratio to support muscle recovery and growth.

name: Advanced BCAA Recovery Formula
description: Advanced recovery formula with BCAAs, glutamine, and electrolytes to maximize muscle recovery and hydration.

name: Premium BCAA 4:1:1 - Tropical Punch
description: Premium BCAA formula with an enhanced 4:1:1 leucine-rich ratio for optimal muscle protein synthesis.

name: Pro Resistance Bands Set - 5 Levels
description: Professional resistance bands set with 5 different resistance levels. Perfect for home workouts, strength training, and physical therapy.

name: Adjustable Dumbbell Set - 2.5-25kg
description: Space-saving adjustable dumbbells with quick-change weight system. Replaces 15 sets of dumbbells with a range from 2.5kg to 25kg per hand.
